oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Veterans' reunion ribbons
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three reunion ribbons for 9th Indiana Volunteer Infantry. The ribbons belonged to William Frances Shaver. Shaver served with the 9th and fought at Shiloh, Chickamauga, and Stones River. He was captured at Chickamauga and served time in Libby prison.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
